name: OCKSimpleContactViewSynchronizer
desc: A view synchronizer that creates and updates a simple contact view.

items.name: func makeView() -> OCKSimpleContactView
items.desc: Creates a view to be synchronized.

items.name: func updateView(OCKSimpleContactView, context: OCKSynchronizationContext<OCKAnyContact?>)
items.desc: Updates a view using a specific context
